posts.message:
السلام عليكم
الى المهاويس :) سؤال مهم جدا وعايز اخد رأيكم معايا فيه
ليه فى الخارج افكار بسيطة جدا وبتنجح نجاح غير متوقع زى مثلا فيسبوك وتويتر وغيرها!!
فى شركات فى مصر بتنتج مواقع وبرامج محتواها ادق واعمق وافكار ممتازة بس فى الأخر ولا حد بيدخل عليها ولا بيشترك حتى فيها مع انها ايضا بالمجان وبدون ذكر امثلة لها علشان مش ناقصة :)

ايه رأيكم في البرنامج ده؟
وهل في افضل منه؟
posts.description:
هل نقدر نتواصل مع بعض (دردشة وصور) اذا اتوقفت شبكات المحمول والانترنت والارضي؟
نقدر.. لما كلنا ننزل برنامج:
FireChat
(شرح اكتر في التعليقات)

posts.message:
I used to use gitk as an essential tool with git 
I was very productive and comfortable with it.

now I had to work on mac machine 
after making the configurations necessary to have gitk in my bash.
 
I had a weird problem that after opening it by 30 second it hangs and consume 100% of cpu 
then it returns to normal state and then hangs and so on.

If you can help me please as I didn't find any other tool that can really replace it for me 
I tried gitx and other tools but it's never like gitk "in my opinion"
حد جرب اي OCR Arabic يقدر يفيدنا فيه بلغه ال C#

An amazing documentary about the journey to build the navigation computer that Apollo 18 crew used to navigate their ship when they were on the dark side of the moon.

Computers at this time used to be huge and heavy and it was almost impossible to use the same computers used in the 60s for that journey. The documentary shows how MIT staff wrote their programs and how they built compact small machines that wasn't possible at this time.

There is a lot of interviews with software developers who worked on the mission and a lot of interesting information for us as programmers. During the landing process they had an error with the code 1202. It was the code for the overflow error. Normally it should've crashed but thanks to an engineer who built a revolutionary operating system at this time that allowed the computer to dump less important tasks and operations in favor for the important stuff.

This is a documentary that is worth every minute of your time to watch. Enjoy it.
posts.caption: dailymotion.com
posts.description: The third episode details the story of MIT's work on the Apollo Guidance Computer.
